;;;41       if (hWin) {

;;;42         WM_InvalidateWindow(hWin);    /* Invalidate window itself */

;;;54     */
;;;55     void WM_ShowWindow(WM_HWIN hWin) {
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
000002  4605              MOV      r5,r0
;;;56       if (hWin) {
000004  b19d              CBZ      r5,|L2.46|
;;;57         WM_Obj *pWin;
;;;58         WM_LOCK();
000006  f7fffffe          BL       GUI_Lock
;;;59         pWin = WM_H2P(hWin);  
00000a  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00000c  f7fffffe          BL       GUI_ALLOC_h2p
000010  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;60         if ((pWin->Status & WM_SF_ISVIS) == 0) {  /* First check if this is necessary at all */
000012  7f20              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0x1c]
000014  f0100f02          TST      r0,#2
000018  d106              BNE      |L2.40|
;;;61           pWin->Status |= WM_SF_ISVIS;  /* Set Visibility flag */
00001a  8ba0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x1c]
00001c  f0400002          ORR      r0,r0,#2
000020  83a0              STRH     r0,[r4,#0x1c]
;;;62           WM_InvalidateWindowAndDescs(hWin);    /* Mark content as invalid */
000022  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000024  f7fffffe          BL       WM_InvalidateWindowAndDescs
                  |L2.40|
;;;63           #if WM_SUPPORT_NOTIFY_VIS_CHANGED
;;;64             WM__NotifyVisChanged(hWin, &pWin->Rect);
;;;65           #endif
;;;66         }
;;;67         WM_UNLOCK();

;;;68       }
00002c  bf00              NOP      
                  |L2.46|
;;;69     }
00002e  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
